title: E-11 "Nine-Tailed Fox"

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may attack a player during the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only shoot your P90 three times.
- You have a bulletproof vest that saves you from one attack dealing Basic or lower damage.

desc:
Post 4484
*" All remaining survivors are advised to remain in the evacuation shelter or any other safe area until the unit has secured the facility. "*
